page.topic: Create new table(s) to match the controls on your UX component
page.description: Creates tables for existing controls in the UX Component. The new tables and fields will match the controls in the UX.
page.discussion: Use this command if you have designed a UX component and would now like to create table(s) that match the structure of your UX. Once you have created table(s) to match the structure of your UX, you will be able to add code int he 'afterDialogValidate' event to save the data that the user submits to one or more tables.
